lead_paragraph: Second-placed AS Monaco slumped to a 2-1 defeat by visiting Girondins de Bordeaux in Ligue 1 on Friday as they missed the chance to open a provisional eight-point gap over their rivals for a Champions League spot.

headline.print_headline: Monaco Suffer 2-1 Loss at Home to Bordeaux
headline.main: Monaco Suffer 2-1 Loss at Home to Bordeaux

snippet: Second-placed AS Monaco slumped to a 2-1 defeat by visiting Girondins de Bordeaux in Ligue 1 on Friday as they missed the chance to open a provisional eight-point gap over their rivals for a Champions League spot....
